org.gradoop.storage.hbase.utils

Class RowKeyDistributor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.storage.hbase.utils.RowKeyDistributor

  • public class RowKeyDistributor
extends Object
    Singleton helper class providing functions to salt HBase row keys with a prefix. This implementation reuses code of HBaseWD (com.sematext.hbase.wd.RowKeyDistributorByOneBytePrefix). Some code is copied directly or has only small changes.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RowKeyDistributor getInstance()
        Static function to return the instance of this RowKeyDistributor.
        Returns:
        the instance of this singleton

      • getDistributedKey

        public byte[] getDistributedKey(byte[] originalKey)
        Get a row key that is salted with a 1 Byte prefix. The prefix is a random Byte between 0 and maxPrefix.
        Parameters:
        originalKey - the original key to add the prefix
        Returns:
        the original key with a prefix byte on the first position

      • getOriginalKey

        public byte[] getOriginalKey(byte[] adjustedKey)
        Get the original key by the given key with a prefix.
        Parameters:
        adjustedKey - the key with a prefix
        Returns:
        the original key without the prefix

      • getAllDistributedKeys

        public byte[][] getAllDistributedKeys(byte[] originalKey)
        Get an array of all possible keys for a given original key.
        Parameters:
        originalKey - the original key
        Returns:
        an array of size maxPrefix with all possible keys

      • setBucketCount

        public void setBucketCount(byte bucketCount)
        Set the bucket count manually. It is used as the maximal prefix.
        Parameters:
        bucketCount - the bucket count as byte
